text.content:
Attack the Darkness

Your enemies are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealed} from you until the end of your next turn.

Melee

Aim Carefully Next Time

Until the end of your next turn, your attacks require and extra action to use.

Ranged

Brutal Collision

Attempt a @Check[type: fortitude] saving throw. If you succeed, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Stunned]{Stunned 1}. If you fail, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Stunned]{Stunned 2}.

Unarmed

Power Transfer

The highest-level beneficial spell effect currently affecting you is transferred to your target.

Spell
